layout.singingstanza: There -- fore, they shall come and sing in the height of Zi -- on, And shall flow to -- geth -- er to the good -- ness of the Lord, For wheat, and for wine, and for oil, and for the young, for the young of the flock and of the herd: And their soul shall be as a wa -- tered gar -- den; And they shall not sor -- row an -- y more at all.
